content:
chaela Krueger Entertainment EditorJune  

For some it is a tradition PERIOD For others it is an escape PERIOD

Since  the Charleston Community Band has given Charleston and the surrounding area a taste of its musical talent PERIOD

To celebrate  years of music the band will perform a patriotic concert at  p.m PERIOD Thursday as part of Charlestons Red White and Blue Days in the Daum Amphitheater at Kiwanis Park PERIOD

The following week the Charleston Community Band will host a Stars and Stripes Patriotic Fanfare starting at  p.m PERIOD MondayJuly  at Daniel Island Smythe Park PERIOD

Band director Ginger Stanfield said it is a privilege to open every performance with the national anthem PERIOD

She said she always tries to include at least two marches a Broadway tune a scared piece something old and something new in every performance PERIOD

Another tradition Stanfield wants to continue is performing a piece featuring a trombone for the founding and previous director of the band John Daum PERIOD

I promised John Daum in  that I would help continue to keep this tradition going as long as the musicians and the community kept supporting it she said PERIOD

The Charleston Community Band consists of people of all ages from high school to  years old PERIOD

About  musicians make up the band some of whom are professionals but most are dedicated amateurs who enjoy playing good music Stanfield said PERIOD

Kamryn Fisher a firstyear member playing clarinet said her favorite part about being in the band is seeing the wide range of ages coming together playing their music PERIOD She said she enjoyed that her grandpa from Sullivan came to watch her perform PERIOD

The Charleston Community Band noted that donations are always appreciated but never expected PERIOD However these donations and sponsors are necessary to continue performing purchase new pieces and maintain their equipment PERIOD

Donations can be given at each concert or mailed to Charleston Community Band  Jackson Avenue Charleston PERIOD

Also throughout the month of June Arbys in Charleston will be donate  percent of all Thursday sales from  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD to help support the band PERIOD

A list of the bands additional performances can be found at httpcharlestoncommunityband.org PERIOD

Chaela Krueger can be reached at  or emailprotected PERIOD
